abstract: rapper action bronson cast in the irishman .
article: rapper action bronson has joined the cast of mob movie the irishman . the all i think hitmaker 's role has not been revealed , but he recently posted a photo of himself alongside star robert de niro and director martin scorsese on instagram . `` religious art , '' he captioned the picture . the netflix film is based on author charles brandt 's 2004 book i heard you paint houses . the title refers to the criminal slang for contract killings . de niro plays real-life union official-turned-mafia hitman frank ` the irishman ' sheeran , while joe pesci portrays gangster russell bufalino .

the irishman has been in development since 2008 , but production plans with paramount pictures executives stalled in 2011 due to scheduling issues . it was only when netflix bosses stepped in last year to produce the film on a reported $ 100 million budget that de niro and scorsese were able to officially move forward with the project . the shoot is expected to wrap soon , and studio officials are reportedly aiming for a late 2018 or early 2019 release .
